attributes.action: Horace 'Harry' Billinge  his MBE should be changed to a knighthood. He is a hero
attributes.background:
Horace 'Harry' Billinge  his MBE should be changed to a knighthood. 
He is a hero, a role model. Not just for his service during the war, all of the great things he has done since and keeps on doing, despite his age and long life reliving those memories

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
